snippet.title: Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego - Catching Carmen Sandiego
snippet.description:
Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? is an educational video game released in 1985. It is the first product in the Carmen Sandiego franchise. The game was distributed with The World Almanac and Book of Facts, published by Pharos Books.

The DOS version is available to play at https://archive.org/details/msdos_Where_in_the_World_is_Carmen_Sandiego_Enhanced_1989

More information about game available at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Where_in_the_World_Is_Carmen_Sandiego%3F_(1985)

Visit http://oneclickhangar.com/forum/index.php for more videos and add-ons for Microsoft Flight Simulator
